title: Introduction to HTML
summary: Learn the basics of HTML structure and elements.
content: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language used to create web pages. It describes the structure of a webpage.

title: Intro to Java - Week 1
summary: Summary of lectures covering basics of the language and its important in the programming world.

title: CSS Flexbox
summary: Master flex containers and flexible layouts.
content: Flexbox is a CSS3 layout mode designed for arranging elements in a predictable way when the size of elements is unknown or dynamic.
